title: Tell me about a recent weekend.

korean: 졸업한 지 2년 만에 처음 다 모인 거였어요.
홍대에서 만나서 점심 먹고 카페 가서 수다 떨었어요.
다들 회사 생활하면서 겪은 일들 얘기하고 그랬죠.
그러다가 저녁에는 술집 가서 치킨이랑 맥주 마시면서 떠들었어요.
오랜만에 만나니까 할 얘기가 정말 많더라고요.
밤 11시까지 있다가 집에 왔는데, 정말 재밌었어요.
일요일에는 전날 술을 너무 많이 마셔서 숙취로 고생했어요.
거의 하루 종일 침대에 누워서 쉬었던 것 같아요.
저녁때쯤 되니까 좀 괜찮아져서 해장국 먹으러 나갔어요.
주말이 순식간에 지나갔지만, 친구들 만나서 좋았어요.
english: Last weekend I spent it a bit specially.
There was a college alumni gathering on Saturday.
It was the first time we all gathered 2 years after graduation.
We met in Hongdae, had lunch, went to a cafe, and chatted.
Everyone talked about things they experienced while working at companies.
Then in the evening we went to a bar, ate chicken and drank beer while talking.
Since we met after a long time, there was really a lot to talk about.
I stayed until 11 PM and came home, and it was really fun.
On Sunday, I suffered from a hangover because I drank too much the day before.
I think I rested lying in bed almost all day.
Around evening time I felt a bit better, so I went out to eat hangover soup.
The weekend passed in an instant, but it was good to meet friends.
